body.name: Montana West Tote Handbag for Women Shoulder Bag Large and Medium 2PCS Purses Set
body.stockDetail: Only 5 left in stock - order soon.
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 6 hrs 32 mins
features: ❤ 【Design】This minimalist structured tote makes this a stylish, everyday go-to bag that will look so good with all your work ensembles. A front gold Montana West logo and initial M-Hangtag adds a stylish pop of contrast to your bag outfit.

❤【Material】This tote bag made of vegan leather and has a chic current classic vibe about it! These purses and handbags will not only add a touch of class to your outfit, but they are also built to last because leather is robust, durable, and practical, with sturdy zippered closures and fasteners.
❤【Dimensions】Large shoulder bag size: 17.32"(L) x 5.5"(W) x 11"(H),Drop: 10".Medium bag size：13.4"x 4.7 x 9.7",Drop: 10"

❤ 【Roomy Compartment】Top zipper closure, large tote bag interior have two open pockets on one side, one zippered pocket on the other. Enough space to arrange your everyday stuff, such as an A3 magazine, an ipad pro, a laptop up to 15 inches in size, a wallet, and personal accessories, among other things.
❤ 【Casual & Chic】More than 5 million customers in America select Montana West! All of our womens purses and handbags were designed by professional designer from Montana West based in Dallas.
body.description: Large and medium 2pcs vegan leather handbag set, it is a great present for your family members, friends or lovers. The purse and handbag may also be folded at the bottom using the center thread, making it convenient to store and travel. We have a wider range of colors for you to choose from to complement your outfit. Zipper lock closure and reinforced stitching on the strap-to-body connection allows you to carry all of your essentials without fear of a sudden rupture.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Montana West is a collection that combines the best of traditional western elements with our unique modern design. We use the premium quality leather and the most exquisite craftsmanship throughout the making of each bag.

Great Gift Ideal Enjoy Montana West Handbags Upgrade your style today with the Montana West Classic Tote Set, the epitome of elegance, versatility and durability. Embrace the next level of chic excellence that makes everyone ask, "Where did you get that fabulous tote bag?" Don't wait any longer - discover the charm of Western Montana now!

Solid Vegan Leather Large Tote Sets for Women Casual and Versatile for Daily This classic handbag is practical and sturdy! Perfect for working, shopping, travelling, overnight or weekend stay, keeping your office files, wallet, cellphone or other daily essentials organized well. reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Lovely bags! Gave one as a gift. Kept larger one. Very fashionable and functional!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The sellers are top notch as well as good products!
reviews.reviewText: The sellers responded before I had a chance to check for a response. No reason not to purchase from this seller. Thanks!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars My Go-To Choice for Style and Functionality - Montana West Tote Handbag Set
reviews.reviewText: As a loyal fan of Montana West, I recently made my third purchase of their Tote Handbag for Women, and I'm compelled to share why this brand keeps drawing me back. This 2PCS set, featuring both large and medium-sized purses, epitomizes the blend of style and practicality I look for in a handbag.Firstly, the aesthetic appeal is undeniable. The design exudes a chic and elegant vibe, making it suitable for a variety of occasions, from casual outings to more formal events. The quality of craftsmanship is evident in the stitching and material selection, ensuring that these bags don't just look good but are built to last.Functionality-wise, the set is a winner. The large tote is perfect for days when I need to carry a bit more, like a tablet or a small umbrella, while the medium bag is ideal for essentials like my wallet, phone, and keys. The interior compartments are thoughtfully designed, allowing for easy organization without compromising on space.The durability of these bags is another aspect worth mentioning. My previous Montana West handbags have withstood daily wear and tear remarkably well, and I expect no less from this set. It's a relief not to worry about fraying or damage after just a few uses.Comfort is key, and these totes deliver. The shoulder straps are well-balanced and don’t dig into my shoulders, even when the bag is full, which is a significant plus for me.The Montana West Tote Handbag set is a testament to the brand's commitment to quality and style. As a three-time buyer, I am consistently impressed by the durability, functionality, and chic design of these bags. They are an excellent investment for anyone looking for a reliable and fashionable handbag solution.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I’ve been using a coach tote for the past 5 years which I love but in need of a new handbag. Bought this one in gray and I absolutely love the medium one. The larger one is a little big for me but I will use it . Great price ! I highly recommend !!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Absolutely love these purses. Love the color, quality, everything about them. Would definitely buy them again. Thank you.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 14, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Great quality and color was gorgeous! Awesome price as well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not worth the effort
reviews.reviewText: Although this is a bargain, I didn't expect for the pockets to be ripped after 1 flight.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 20, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Love tote bags. This came up as a deal during Prime Days and had to get it. Has pockets inside, has a zipper to close up the entire bags so when it falls over in the car…everything isn’t scattered all over. The back exterior zippered pocket to hold a gun is also perfect to use to store my phone and keys. Incredible that it comes with an additional mini —but not too small tote!!! . The straps are adjustable which is wonderful feature so it can accommodate different preferences and adjust with bulkier clothing. Price was great.
Son bolsas bonitas. Excelente material aunque rígido, trae forro. Y su diseño es elegante. Buen tamaño: una tote y una pequeña. Me gustoooo
